name: Captain Flamethrower Visits The Abortion Clinic
name_original: Captain Flamethrower Visits The Abortion Clinic
description:
The sequel to "Captain Flamethrower visits the Children's Hospital", a game NOBODY asked for, play as the mentally unstable and tastelessly offensive firebug ads you run amuck in the local planned parenthood!
NOTE :
This isn't some kind of political statement, notice how the captain burns both the bible thumping protester outside the clinic, as well as all those inside.
Captain has no agenda. Unless you count spreading flames over everything indiscriminately.
